text: Graham McTavish (born 4 January 1961) is a Scottish movie, television and voice actor. McTavish appeared in the 2011 movie The Wicker Tree, Robin Hardy's sequel to his 1973 movie, The Wicker Man and played Dwalin in Peter Jackson's The Hobbit trilogy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Actors from Glasgow
title: Graham McTavish
